title: iPod
summary: The iPod is a line of portable media players and multi-purpose mobile devices[2] designed and marketed by Apple Inc. The first version was released on October 23, 2001, about 8+1‚ÅÑ2 months after the Macintosh version of iTunes was released. As of May 28, 2019, only the iPod Touch (7th generation) remains in production.[3]
